vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with HDR Engineering, Inc. to provide additional engineering services required for developing construction plans and specifications related to flood management and stormwater improvements at 11 locations - Not to exceed $286,287.30, from $611,465.80 to $897,753.10 - Financing: Flood Control D Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($152,534.55), Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($72,395.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($61,357.75)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with HDR Engineering, Inc. to provide additional engineering services required for developing construction plans and specifications related to flood management and stormwater improvements at 11 locations - Not to exceed $286,287.30, from $611,465.80 to $897,753.10 - Financing: Flood Control D Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($152,534.55), Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($72,395.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($61,357.75)
